title: TA Associates divests 8% stake in Prudent Corp for Rs 414 crore
description: TA Associates through its arm TA FDI Investors Ltd offloaded shares of Prudent Corporate Advisory Services on the National Stock Exchange (NSE). According to the bulk deal data available with the NSE, TA FDI Investors offloaded 33,12,534 shares, representing an 8% stake in Prudent Corporate Advisory Services.
